name: Prescripts's Blessing
uniques: Comment [Strength is Proportional to the amount of Faith Stockpiled, with Progressing Eras increasing the max Strength capacity bonus]
[+30]% Strength <when number of [Faith] is more than [50]>
[+30]% Strength <when number of [Faith] is more than [100]>
[+40]% Strength <when number of [Faith] is more than [150]> <starting from the [Renaissance era]>
[+40]% Strength <when number of [Faith] is more than [200]> <starting from the [Renaissance era]>
[+50]% Strength <when number of [Faith] is more than [250]> <starting from the [Industrial era]>
[+50]% Strength <when number of [Faith] is more than [300]> <starting from the [Industrial era]>
[+60]% Strength <when number of [Faith] is more than [400]> <starting from the [Modern era]>
[+60]% Strength <when number of [Faith] is more than [500]> <starting from the [Modern era]>
[+70]% Strength <when number of [Faith] is more than [600]> <starting from the [Modern era]>
[+70]% Strength <when number of [Faith] is more than [700]> <starting from the [Modern era]>
[+100]% Strength <when number of [Faith] is more than [800]> <starting from the [Information era]>
[+100]% Strength <when number of [Faith] is more than [1000]> <starting from the [Information era]>
